mapper.select: SELECT join_date, work_place_name, end_date FROM career
SELECT join_date, work_place_name, end_date FROM career WHERE join_date != null ORDER BY join_date DESC LIMIT #{page}, 10

SELECT join_date, work_place_name, end_date FROM (SELECT rownum rn, m_code, join_date, work_place_name, end_date from career where m_code = #{m_code} order by join_date desc) WHERE rn >= #{pageStart} AND rn <= (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum})
SELECT join_date, work_place_name, end_date FROM (SELECT rownum rn, m_code, join_date, work_place_name, end_date from career where m_code = #{m_code} order by join_date desc)
SELECT COUNT(rownum) FROM career WHERE m_code = #{id} AND rownum > 0
